attributes.action: The UK to pay for and distribute the oxford vaccine as part of its foreign aid
attributes.additional_details: To show the world that Global Britain is back, is caring of others, sees social responsibility and economic activity are not mutually exclusive and that we can help our friends in time of need.
attributes.background: I want the UK to manufacture and help distribute the oxford vaccine to developing and poorer nations to assist their rebuilding from the Covid 19 pandemic, allowing their economies to unlock and their people to be as safe as those in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550900
